trait.name: Fear The Horde
entries: This creature gets {@hit 1} to hit for every two other Infested adjacent to attacked enemy. (Maximum of +4)

trait.name: Infested
entries: This creature is Infested, corpses not burnt, pulped or dismembered are dangerous.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit -4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the attack is a critical hit it turns into a Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4}) damage. Inflicts Festering Wound on failed {@dc 10} Constitution save.
This recently-risen body moves quickly, darting its head back and forth and gnawing at its hands.

trait.name: Fear The Horde
entries: This creature gets {@hit 1} to hit for every two other Infested adjacent to attacked enemy. (Maximum of +4)

trait.name: Infested
entries: This creature is Infested, corpses not burnt, pulped or dismembered are dangerous.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit -4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the attack is a critical hit it turns into a Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4}) damage. Inflicts Festering Wound on failed {@dc 12} Constitution save.
A human body, swaying as it moves, an unstoppable rage visible in its oily black eyes.

trait.name: Fear The Horde
entries: This creature gets {@hit 1} to hit for every two other Infested adjacent to attacked enemy. (Maximum of +4)

trait.name: Volatile
entries: On death creates loud explosion of vile bile. Non-infested creatures adjacent to Boomer are {@condition poisoned} for one turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit -4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the attack is a critical hit it turns into a Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4}) damage. Inflicts Festering Wound on failed {@dc 12} Constitution save.

action.name: Puke
entries: 10 ft range. {@dc 12} Dexterity save or be {@condition poisoned} for one turn.
A rotund human body, bloated beyond belief and layered in rolls of fat. It emits a horrible odor, and a putrid pink sludge dribbles from its mouth.

Stumbling as it moves, this corpse of an overweight human regards its surroundings with an empty black gaze.

action.name: Grab
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit -4} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. On hit, target is {@condition grappled} and on each of this creature's turns is reeled in to melee range on failed {@dc 12} Strength save. {@dc 12} Athletics or Acrobatics to break out of grapple as an action.
An undead humanoid, its elongated arms drag along the ground as it moves. It looks to almost have a hunch from the swollen back and shoulder muscles tearing through its skin.
